#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
#define tr(c,i) for(auto i=(c).begin(); i != (c).end(); i++)
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<(n);i++)
int tcs, tc;

ll nc2(ll n) {
	return n * (n-1) / 2;
}

#define MAXN 1000006
ll n, t, mn;
ll m[MAXN];

int main () {
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin >> n;
	mn = 0;
	rep (i, n) {
		cin >> t;
		mn = max(mn, t);
		m[t]++;
	}
	ll ans = nc2(n);
	rep (i, mn+1)
		ans -= nc2(m[i]);
	cout << ans;
	return 0;
}
